description: Suspected divisor-or-multiple permutation: a(1) = 1, and for n > 1, a(n) is either the second smallest divisor of a(n-1) not already present in sequence, or the smallest divisor if it is the only one not yet used, or (if all divisors have been already encountered), a(n) = a(n-1) * {the least power of the least prime not dividing a(n-1) such that the term is not already present}.
